org.springframework.boot.logging.logback.CorrelationIdConverter
All Implemented Interfaces:
ch.qos.logback.core.spi.ContextAware, ch.qos.logback.core.spi.LifeCycle
public class CorrelationIdConverter extends ch.qos.logback.core.pattern.DynamicConverter<ch.qos.logback.classic.spi.ILoggingEvent>
Logback DynamicConverter to convert a CorrelationIdFormatter pattern into formatted output using data from the MDC and Environment.
Since:
3.2.0
Author:
Phillip Webb
